meanings.definition: The ability to exert great physical force or power.
meanings.sent1: Her superstrength allowed her to lift heavy objects with ease.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's superstrength helped him defeat the villain.
meanings.sent3: With his superstrength, he accidentally crushed the doorknob while opening the door.
meanings.sent4: Her superstrength was like a hidden power waiting to be unleashed.
meanings.sent5: The image of his superstrength remained etched in their minds long after he left.

meanings.definition: A quality or characteristic of being exceptionally strong or powerful.
meanings.sent1: The giant's superstrength was unmatched in the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's superstrength was evident in every competition.
meanings.sent3: His superstrength in debates made him the undisputed champion of words.
meanings.sent4: The superstrength of the team's spirit carried them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The superstrength of the bond between them was unbreakable.
